summary: OMELET FSMVRP (fleet size and mix vrp) API for multiple days
description: Generates cost-optimized delivery schedules over multiple days (up to 7). Supports up to 1,000 visits per day and a time limit of 120 seconds for optimization.Supports combination of objectives via the `objective_costs` field. `ownership_type` determines whether vehicles appear in the API result always (`owned`) or only when used (`rented`).

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifies the expected response media type and API version.
Must be "application/vnd.omelet.v2+json" to indicate version 2 of the OMELET Vehicle Routing API.

VersionedJSON.summary: Use v2 of OMELET JSON API
